description: This Python script demonstrates how to perform an asynchronous reliability evaluation of an AI agent using the agno library. It sets up an agent with a specific model and tools, runs a test query, and evaluates the reliability of the response asynchronously.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with a model and tools.

classes.name: ReliabilityEval
classes.description: Performs a reliability evaluation of an agent's response.

classes.name: ReliabilityResult
classes.description: Contains the result of a reliability evaluation.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Represents an OpenAI chat model configuration.

classes.name: RunResponse
classes.description: Encapsulates the response from running an agent.

classes.name: CalculatorTools
classes.description: Provides calculator tools, including factorial computation.

methods.name: factorial
methods.description: Sets up an agent, runs a factorial query, and evaluates its reliability asynchronously.
